Welcome to My Site

This is a minimalistic design example using a custom CSS library with dark/light mode support.

About This Library

The library provides a clean, modern design by resetting base styles and using CSS variables for theming. Toggle the theme by changing the data-theme attribute on the <html> element.

To Install: Download CSS File

Add the following link in the head of your HTML: https://manuelwestermeier.github.io/fast-css/dist.css

Fast CSS Example

Example Fieldset

This fieldset is styled with a border, padding, and rounded corners. It demonstrates how the CSS variables affect form elements and container elements.
